content:
You're already on Goodreads! That's a great start. Goodreads is an excellent platform to connect with fellow readers, track your reading progress, and discover new books.

Congratulations on setting a reading goal for the year! 25 books is a great target, and you're making good progress so far. Catching up might be challenging, but with a consistent reading habit and some great book recommendations, you'll get there in no time.

If you need any help staying on track or finding new books to read, feel free to reach out. I'd be happy to provide more recommendations or suggest ways to stay motivated.

By the way, what kind of books are you hoping to read to reach your goal? Are you open to exploring different genres or sticking to your favorite types of books?
